title: Coordination Circuit Characterization
significance: Circuit model for coordination complexity established!

new_questions.question: Is CC-NC^1 = NC^1 exactly? (Tight characterization)
new_questions.notes: If yes, enables Q125 proof strategy

new_questions.question: Is CC-NC^k = NC^k for all k?
Can coordination techniques prove new NC lower bounds?
What is the CC-circuit complexity of consensus?
new_questions.notes: Consensus is CC_log-complete; what's its CC-circuit depth?

new_questions.question: Can CC-circuits be made fault-tolerant? What's the overhead?
new_questions.notes: Combine Phase 54 Byzantine techniques with circuits
